mapper.insert: insert into gds_search(id, keyword, creator, createTime) values(#{id}, #{keyword}, #{creator}, #{createTime});
mapper.select: SELECT keyword FROM gds_search GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC LIMIT 8;
